section.name: Extension Guide
section.p: Hippo CMS provides a full enterprise content management system that can be used straight out of the box. Should the default functionality however not suit your organization's needs, then its open component based architecture allows for easy customization and extension of the system.

ul.li: Document Types - Customize the Hippo ECM document types or create your own
Add-ons - Extend Hippo ECM with your own add-ons.
Custom Packaging - Create a custom war file on top of the quickstart war
